title: Best Paper Award at ACL 2025 for Deep Learning Approaches in Healthcare NLP
summary: Our research team received the Best Paper Award at the Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL 2025) for groundbreaking work in healthcare NLP.
content: The paper 'Transformer-based Clinical Note Analysis for Automated Diagnosis Support' demonstrates significant improvements in medical text understanding and has potential applications in clinical decision-making systems.

title: New ICML 2024 paper on Transformer-based Multi-modal Sentiment Analysis
summary: Our latest research on multi-modal sentiment analysis has been accepted to ICML 2024, one of the premier machine learning conferences.
content: This work introduces a novel architecture for combining textual and visual information to improve sentiment classification accuracy across multiple domains.

title: Prof. Kim appointed as Associate Editor for IEEE Transactions on AI
summary: Professor Kim has been appointed as an Associate Editor for IEEE Transactions on Artificial Intelligence, recognizing leadership in the AI research community.

title: Graduate student recruitment for Spring 2025 now open
summary: We are actively recruiting graduate students (MS/PhD) for Spring 2025. Application deadline is January 31, 2025.
content: We welcome applications from motivated students interested in AI, NLP, and machine learning research. Full funding available for qualified PhD candidates.

title: AI Ethics Workshop - Responsible AI Development
summary: Join our workshop on AI Ethics and Responsible AI Development on December 15, 2024.
content: This workshop will bring together researchers, industry practitioners, and policymakers to discuss ethical considerations in AI development and deployment.

title: Collaboration with Industry Partner on Natural Language Understanding
summary: Our lab has initiated a new collaboration with a leading tech company to advance natural language understanding technologies.

title: PhD Student Wins Best Student Paper at NeurIPS 2024
summary: Congratulations to our PhD student for receiving the Best Student Paper Award at NeurIPS 2024.
content: The awarded paper presents novel techniques for efficient training of large language models with reduced computational requirements.

title: New Research Grant from National Science Foundation
summary: Our lab has been awarded a $1.2M grant from NSF to research explainable AI for healthcare applications.
content: This three-year grant will support research into developing interpretable machine learning models for medical diagnosis and treatment planning.

title: AI & Society Symposium 2024 - Call for Papers
summary: Call for papers for the AI & Society Symposium 2024. Submission deadline: November 30, 2024.

title: Lab Member Presents at International Conference on Robotics
summary: Our research on AI-driven robotic systems was presented at ICRA 2024 in Yokohama, Japan.

title: Keynote Speech at AI Summit Seoul 2024
summary: Prof. Kim delivered a keynote speech on 'The Future of Language AI' at AI Summit Seoul 2024.

title: Summer Research Internship Program Concludes Successfully
summary: Our summer internship program concluded with presentations from 8 undergraduate students showcasing their AI research projects.
